TopicTitle: a certain mod that should be stock...

Articles.Content: I personaly think that kerbal engineer should be stock. it is so helpful, I can't believe it isn't.

While many of us of like the idea, it's on the What Not To Suggest list because these functions have been suggested so many times before, so I'll close this thread.

For what it's worth, Maxmaps liked the idea:

I'm a big fan of engineer and we might need something similar ingame in the future. We're not big fans of the player getting big advantages at zero cost, though.
